channel.title: Best armour for a level 70 defence?
channel.description: Looking for suggestions, and if your feeling generous, MAYYYBEEE you'd donate this armour to me.

item.title: Best armour for a level 70 defence?
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

It Depends, What would you be using the armour for.(PvP,PvM,Training) How much money do you have to spend. Etc

Read full topic
item.source: Best armour for a level 70 defence?

item.title: Best armour for a level 70 defence?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Torags has the best defence overall, but still shares with the other sets. Torag’s helmet and Guthan’s helmet have the best defence out of the barrows helmets. The platebodies of Torag, Guthans and Dharoks have equal defence bonuses. Same goes for Dharok’s and Torag’s legs. Guthan’s skirt is slightly less, but still very good.

Read full topic
item.source: Best armour for a level 70 defence?

barrows

What armour exactly?

All melee have equal stats.
[/quote]
nope. Torags is better defence, than dh, veracs, ect.[/quote]
Not the platelegs. I’ve checked.
